duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform clerical and data entry functions to support the BCN provider enrollment process.
Evaluate and route provider affiliation requests and recontracting, and enter data into corporate provider data systems.
Manage document storage, perform research, and identify required provider information on incoming enrollment and maintenance forms.
Enter data into provider data applications, receive and distribute mail, and maintain accurate logs.
Communicate with internal customers, various BCN/BCBSM departments, and multiple levels of staff and leadership.
Perform general clerical functions, maintain departmental files, records, and coordinate paper flow.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required, Additional Related Coursework At The College Level Preferred
